thread.section_title: American Apartment Owners Association Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Apartment Owners Association | american-apartment-owners-association.org
thread.title: Nancy Nichols
thread.title_full: American Apartment Owners Association reviewed by Nancy Nichols

author: Nancy Nichols
title: Nancy Nichols
text:
I'm very disappointed in your website. As a new member I put in the promo code to get the $20 discount on membership , it stated I would pay $79.00 and the site would then not let me confirm the membership or order. So, I went back in and had to pay the full $99 before it would confirm my membership. Now, I tried to download forms I ordered but I did not get the download (and you have charged my credit card). Very disappointing. You also need to have a weekend call in service
nancy
